item.title: Tomato Soup with Bean Sprout
item.description: Extra Info Ingredients Ingredient Standard Weight 1 Weight 2 Large tomato 0.5 Tomato Bean Sprouts (Fresh) 150 g Green Onion 1 Tbsp. Salt 1 Tbsp. Sugar 0.5 Tspn. Sesame Oil 0.5 Tbsp. Objects Object (Optional) Instructions Simmer 250 ml of water.
